## AsyncResult type

The result of calling an async method on a client.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AsyncResult<T> = {
    isLoading: true;
    data: undefined;
    error: undefined;
} | {
    isLoading: false;
    data: T;
    error: undefined;
} | {
    isLoading: false;
    data: undefined;
    error: Error;
};
```
